title: Strategy for survival
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, David H. Fowler and Grant Foster
brief_description: The survival of several rare bird species in New Zealand is now threatened, and steps need to be taken for their conservation. Narrated by Sir Robert Falls.
